title: Episode 2 - Jon Halperin from The Glass House/Chain Reaction/Vegas Records etc..
itunes:title: Episode 2 - Jon Halperin from The Glass House/Chain Reaction/Vegas Records etc..
description:
In our second episode I speak with Jon Halperin, who is the main talent buyer for The Glass House in Pomona, CA, about his upbringing in suburbia, his fathers life as a spy and the worst part of his job. His dogs also make an appearance throughout the episode as well. Logo courtesy of Chris Hansen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
